attributes.review: Just as soon as it appeared on my home page my phone started glitching non stop. Phone is always freezing, home button became delayed. I’m just so distraught that our amazing Dictato- I meant PRESIDENT Trump, yes president is what I meant, could even think of putting such a terrible thing on the App Store. I am 100% reconsidering my vote in the coming up elections.
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded!!

attributes.review:
This app is the worst app ever. It’s disgusting, its inappropriate for kids. This should be ban from any App Store forever. This is not safe and should not be used ever again. This is soo bad because you can get hacked by the President and from the creators. Please never use this app in any
 circumstances, this is a horrible app and should never be used again. 
        Thank you
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is so bad. I was planing on enjoying it to see what 🍊has to say but it took 5 hours to download. The whole app is rigged💀 and needs new updates it doesn’t even let me see the news and is completely slow no matter how good WiFi‼️ I have. I don’t recommend downloading it it’s completely useless and it has no point🤦‍♀️💩
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: As much as I love 💕 our macho president  and all that he does. The apps terms and conditions are too invasive of my private information. In order to do anything in the app I have to give my phone number. I’ve heard a lot about 5G radiation and I’m not gonna test my luck. Also I can’t afford messaging rates, talk about blocking out your cult, I mean, fan base
attributes.title: Too invasive off an app

attributes.review: chile, lemme start by saying i was trying to support the orange king, until a traumatizing series of events occurred. First, when i put my phone number in, i received a threat that if i don’t deposit 50k into an unknown bank account i will be toured and all my toes and fingers would be severed by the cia (CRAZY IK). since i’m broke🙈 i was like well uhhhh. chile anyways um i am about to be doxxed and imma head out
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: it’s NOT  it right when i open the app it crashes and keeps talking me back to home page not acceptable at all but worst of all when it doesn’t crash there’s this monster like demon thing hes orange and has like hair loss but yet thin bird nest hair i really hope this gets fixed had to go to therapy someone need to pay for them there is no TW 🙅‍♀️😾😹
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: apple 🍏 can u do ur thing and delete this app cus this is a terrible app!! it took a whole WEEK to download and now it won’t even work?!?! i opened my phone 📲 this morning with spammed notifications from the app with inappropriate messages from our so called president! delete this now!!! 👿👿👿this is horrendous! absolutely breath taking, and not in a good way..😳🧚
attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP!!!🙅‍♀️

attributes.review: It glitches so much and it’s taking money from my personal checking account. it has too much access to my phone. everytime i use it, my screen turns orange 🍊 and my phone overheats. and it keeps telling me ab this homophobic, xenophobic, racist, sexist, child predator 74 year old. i didn’t ask for this and it’s a bad app overall!
attributes.title: do not get!!!! phone will heat

attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app, I was hoping I would get some additional information about Trump, but instead I got a picture of all my family members in there and say all of my family will die. I feel so horrified I have to close the app and then report about this. Please don't download this app, it only spread fear for people.
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: THIS IS HORRIBLE VERY CERY HORRIBLE first it would download for hours and hours and all my other apps download in like 30 seconds and then it took me at least a hour to sign in it wouldn’t let me and then after that it was super glitchy like no this is the worst app I have ever download I deleted it already and informed my friends
attributes.title: This needs to leave the App Store !
